content.data:
{ "bgColor" : null, "richText" : "

Dear customers, until further notice our changed opening times apply in the central warehouse in Krefeld. The collection of your ordered furniture is possible Monday - Friday from 1 p.m. to 6 p.m. & Saturday from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m.

", "align" : "left", "styleClass" : null, "customCss" : "font-size: 16px;" }

{ "bgColor" : null, "richText" : "

Knuffmann has been a guarantee for high-quality furniture and home accessories for more than 100 years. With us you will find a huge range of furniture from well-known brand manufacturers such as Hülsta, Rolf Benz or Musterring as well as our own brands Mondo, Vito and Valmondo, kitchens from Nobilia or Nolte, supplemented by an extensive range of home accessories and housewares for every furnishing style. Discover many new living ideas for your living room , dining room , hallway , bedroom or bathroom and be inspired by the latest living trends in our exhibitions.


Whatever you need, you are guaranteed to find it in our branches. From the wall unit to showcases, sideboards and shelves to tables , chairs , benches , cupboards and beds , we offer you the latest furniture trends as well as versatile small pieces of furniture of the highest quality. All of our products impress with their first-class design and offer you plenty of functionality and storage space. With our modern kitchens, supplemented by kitchen and household accessories, amateur cooks get their money's worth. Stylish home accessories , lights ,Bath accessories , home textiles, decorative items and rugs round out our extensive range.


Our team of experienced consultants and furnishing experts also supports you in planning and realizing your dream home and offers you comprehensive customer service . Get advice on living space and kitchen design in one of our Knuffmann furniture stores or kitchen markets and take advantage of our financing offers as well as the professional assembly and assembly service. The inspiring flair in our furniture stores turns your shopping at Knuffmann into a fun shopping experience. If you want to linger a little longer, you have the opportunity  to let yourself be pampered with culinary delights in our restaurant .


We are looking forward to your visit! You can find your nearest Knuffmann branch here .

", "align" : "center", "styleClass" : null, "customCss" : "font-size: 16px" }

{ "xsCarouselIndicators" : true, "smCarouselControls" : true, "mdCarouselIndicators" : true, "xsCarouselControls" : true, "smCarouselIndicators" : true, "xsCarouselSlidesToDisplay" : 1, "mdCarouselSlidesToDisplay" : 1, "textHeadline" : null, "smCarouselSlidesToDisplay" : 1 }

{ "bgColor" : null, "richText" : "

INFORMATION ABOUT GOODS COLLECTION

", "align" : "center", "styleClass" : "h1 text-center", "customCss" : "color: #004290;\nfont-size:28px;\ntext-transform: uppercase;;" "catalogID" : "headerKnuffmannCatalog", "styleClass" : null }
